description: Get breaking national and world news, broadcast video coverage, and exclusive interviews. Find the top news online at ABC news.
maintext:
Actor Anthony Anderson will host the second annual NBA Awards.
The show honoring the league's top performers will air June 25 on TNT from Barker Hangar in Santa Monica, California. The league MVP, defensive player of the year, rookie of the year and lifetime achievement awards will be handed out, among others.
Anderson, the star of ABC's "black-ish," is an NBA fan who frequently attends games in Los Angeles. He has previously hosted the NCAAP Image Awards and BET Awards.
———
More AP NBA: https://apnews.com/tag/NBAbasketball
title: Anthony Anderson to host 2nd annual NBA Awards
